page.title: 14The Village Hall
page.content:
There is a village hall in the three villages in our area.People go there for coffee mornings,to play cards_whist drives and also to dance.There is a youth club at the village hall at Blackfordby. For adults in are area there are also some public houses:
Smisby The Nelson Hartshorne The Rodney The Chesterfield Blackfordby The Blue Bell The Black Lion
There is a recreation park for children in all three villages. If children want to join Cubs,Scouts,Brownies,Red Cross,St.Johns they have to travel to nearby towns. (next page)
